column4: I don't know any, but you could simply use KGet, I personally use KGet under Gnome, it doesn't have too many dependencies

- I just realized that even ktorrent only takes 200mb under GNOME... I'm trying to keep a smallish footprint, but I think that is easily spared, especially if I can then ditch trasmission and reclaim part of that
- I d appreciate your answer though.  Thanks for taking the time.
